titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I selected two discourses for use in Glasgow Cathedral next Sunday. McAdam Muir wrote suggesting that I should preach in my surplice. Such a suggestion is not without significance. I wrote several letters, &, for the rest, did little, feeling rather exhausted after the fatigues of yesterday.
